meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 왜 내... - 방금 사투리 쓰려고 했지? Why... - Did you want to say in dialect? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 이또아승🦊🐶Ep.1 다시...ㅠ
vlive.english: Why... - Did you want to say in dialect?

vlive.korean: [렛츠 기릿] - 렛츠 - 기릿! - 5번을 다 던져요? - 이 친구 머리 쓰려고 하네? [Let's get it] - Let's. - Get it! - We throw 5 times? - He tries to use a trick. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.104
vlive.english: [Let's get it] - Let's. - Get it! - We throw 5 times? - He tries to use a trick.

vlive.korean: 이거 찍어서 얻다 쓰려고! What is this for? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 어장남 퇴치법_EP07 [라이크]
그래서 몇 개나 인서울로 쓰려고? So, how many colleges in Seoul do you want to apply? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 말빨이 딸릴 때 쓰는 최후의 방법 [인서울] - EP.03
vlive.english: So, how many colleges in Seoul do you want to apply?

vlive.korean: 제가 사실 오늘 비니 쓰려고 갖고왔는데 한번 써볼까요? I brought a beanie to wear today. Should I try it on? 듣기 View video CIX : 나랑 크리스마스 브이앱🎄
vlive.english: I brought a beanie to wear today. Should I try it on?

examples.korean: He claims he keeps a bottle of brandy only for medicinal purposes. 발음듣기 그는 약으로만 쓰려고 브랜디 한 병을 갖고 있는 것이라고 주장한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He claims he keeps a bottle of brandy only for medicinal purposes. 발음

examples.korean: Don’t wobble the table—I’m trying to write. 발음듣기 탁자 흔들지 마. 내가 글 쓰려고 하잖아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t wobble the table—I’m trying to write. 발음

examples.korean: She buried herself in the country to write a book. 발음듣기 그녀는 책을 쓰려고 시골에 틀어박혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She buried herself in the country to write a book. 발음

examples.korean: I keep meaning to write, but never seem to find (the) time. 발음듣기 난 계속 편지를 쓰려고 하는데, 도저히 시간이 안 나는 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I keep meaning to write, but never seem to find (the) time. 발음

examples.korean: He’s saving his strength for the last part of the race. 발음듣기 그는 경주 마지막 부분에 쓰려고 힘을 아끼고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s saving his strength for the last part of the race. 발음
